mapper.select: SELECT * FROM qnacs ORDER BY id ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qnacs (consumerId, sellerId, title, comment, createDate) VALUES (#{consumerId}, #{sellerId}, #{title}, #{comment}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT qnacs.id, qnacs.sellerId, qnacs.consumerId, qnacs.title, qnacs.comment, qnacs.createDate, qnacsreplies.id AS replyid, qnacsreplies.parentId, qnacsreplies.sellerId AS replySellerId, qnacsreplies.consumerId AS replyConsumerId, qnacsreplies.comment AS replyComment, qnacsreplies.createDate AS replyCreateDate FROM qnacs LEFT JOIN qnacsreplies ON qnacs.id = qnacsreplies.parentId WHERE qnacs.id = #{id} ORDER BY qnacsreplies.createDate ASC;

SELECT qnacs.id, qnacs.sellerId, qnacs.consumerId, qnacs.title, qnacs.comment, qnacs.createDate, qnacsreplies.id AS replyId, qnacsreplies.parentId, qnacsreplies.sellerId AS replySellerId, qnacsreplies.consumerId AS replyConsumerId, qnacsreplies.comment AS replyComment, qnacsreplies.createDate AS replyCreateDate FROM qnacs LEFT JOIN qnacsreplies ON qnacs.id = qnacsreplies.parentId WHERE qnacs.consumerId = #{consumerId} ORDER BY qnacs.id ASC;

SELECT qnacs.id, qnacs.sellerId, qnacs.consumerId, qnacs.title, qnacs.comment, qnacs.createDate, qnacsreplies.id AS replyId, qnacsreplies.parentId, qnacsreplies.sellerId AS replySellerId, qnacsreplies.consumerId AS replyConsumerId, qnacsreplies.comment AS replyComment, qnacsreplies.createDate AS replyCreateDate FROM qnacs LEFT JOIN qnacsreplies ON qnacs.id = qnacsreplies.parentId WHERE qnacs.sellerId = #{sellerId} ORDER BY qnacs.id ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qnacsreplies (parentId, comment, sellerId, consumerId, createDate) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{comment}, #{sellerId}, #{consumerId}, NOW());
